svgRoot: <svg width="400" height="200" style="position: relative; background-color: rgb(255,255,255);" > <defs>#svgStyle#</defs> #pattern# <text x="20" y="#rand#">#sentence#</text> </svg>
svgStyle: <style>@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Rubik:300,300i,500'); text { font-family:'Rubik',sans-serif; font-weight:300; font-style:italic; fill:rgb(65,65,65); font-size:28px; display:block; max-width:100%; } tspan{background-color:rgb(255,255,255);} </style>
shape: <rect x="#rand#" y="#rand#" width="30" height="30" stroke="black" fill="transparent" stroke-width="5"/>

<rect x="#rand#" y="#rand#" width="#rand#" height="#rand#" stroke="#shapecolor#" fill="#rand#" fill-opacity="#rand#" stroke-width="#rand#"<polyline points="0 0, 20 20, 30 30, 30 10" stroke-width="2" fill="transparent" stroke="black"/>
<line x1="#rand#" x2="#rand#" y1="#rand#" y2="#rand#" stroke="black" stroke-width="2"/>
sentenceBackground: <rect x="18" y="#rand#" width="#rand#" height="30" fill="white" opacity=".4"/><rect x="18" y="#rand#" width="100%" height="30" fill="white" fill-opacity=".75"/>
sentence: Did you know? #computerAdjective.capitalize# #senseNoun# feel good to computers.
